doc.name: capStyle

syntax.example: set the capStyle [of graphic] to {butt | square | round}

doc.summary: Specifies how the ends of lines and dashes will be drawn.

examples.example: set the capStyle of graphic "dashedRectangle1" to "round"

description.p: Changes the appearance of line and dash ends for graphic objects. The three values it can be set to produce the following effects:
square - the edge is extended beyond the end-point by half the line width
round - lines are ended by a half-circle centred at the end-point of the line
Note: This only affects polygon, freehand curve and line graphics which have their antialiased set to true.
